description:
Get more out of your headsets and webcams, and book your spaces for better days in the office.

Take charge of your workplace experience wherever you are â€” at home, in the office or on the go. Webcam and headset settings are all at your fingertips to ensure you look and sound the way you want in video meetings.

In addition, if your organization uses Logitech room and desk booking, you can easily find the right space, with the right tools at the right time and with the right people for better days in the office.
